channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Crypto crime-fighting startup TRM Labs notches $1 billion valuation with new $70 million funding round
item.description: With its blockchain analytics tools, TRM Labs helps private companies and agencies like the FBI track illicit finance.

item.title: Walmart Joins Nvidia in the $1 Trillion Club
item.description: The retail giant took 64 years to reach the $1 trillion milestone.

item.title: Palantir CEO Alex Karp says Trump has a point about the AI race: ‘there’s a real hesitance to adopt these kind of products in the West’
item.description: Alex Karp said he sees a real "lack of adoption in Canada, Northern Europe, and in Europe in general." It's terrible news for politics, he added.

item.title: Nike just flipped its logo for LeBron’s son, Bronny James
item.description: Los Angeles Lakers guard Bronny James quietly debuted a new logo for his signature shoe during last week’s game against the Cleveland Cavaliers: a low...

item.title: Nevada legislators blast Boring Company over safety and environmental violations as Elon Musk-owned startup declines to testify in hearing
item.description: Elon Musk's tunneling startup said it was “unable to attend” the four-hour hearing in Las Vegas about violations it has racked up since 2022.

item.title: High electricity prices are getting in the way of heat pump installations
item.description: Heat pumps can reduce carbon emissions associated with heating buildings , and many states have set aggressive targets to increase their use in the co...

item.title: ‘Shark Tank’s’ Barbara Corcoran Says More Fun Leads to More Success. Science Agrees
item.description: Science agrees with the real estate mogul’s delightfully pleasant advice, and offers concrete tips on how to invite more fun into your life.

item.title: Cracker Barrel Wanted to Cut Costs. Instead, It Damaged Its Own Brand–Again
item.description: It’s another lesson in what not to do from the beleaguered restaurant chain.

item.title: Allbirds has a comeback plan—winning over the fashion crowd

item.title: TikTok is fueling a SoulCycle comeback

item.title: The DOT’s new beautification council could Trumpify U.S. transportation infrastructure
item.description: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy this week launched a new advisory council that could reshape American transportation in President Donald Trump’s a...

item.title: You Can’t Find a Job Because LinkedIn Went Full TikTok
item.description: LinkedIn’s $5B quarter had nothing to do with anyone finding work.

item.title: Ro CEO wants to erase GLP-1 stigma with first Super Bowl ad featuring Serena Williams
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: 5 Consulting Companies Share Their Tips for Getting Paid on Time
item.description: Starting a consulting firm? Here’s how to avoid getting paid late—or not at all.

item.description: The head of Amazon's cloud business says major obstacles need to be overcome before space-based data centers are a reality.
